details.title: Errata and comments for the “Basic Tracking” tutorials [Aug 14 4-53, 54-75]
details.abstract: This provides corrections and additional comments to the tutorials “Basic Tracking Using Nonlinear 3D Monostatic and Bistatic Measurements” and “Basic Tracking Using Nonlinear 3D Monostatic and Bistatic Measurements in Refractive Environments.”
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
